place_description: Casual, counter-serve outpost offering sandwiches & desserts plus bubble tea drinks in many flavors.

reviews_data.review_text: Great service and great bubble tea! Highly recommend!
Best BT coffee
Great atmosphere and great drinks!

The ONLY good place to get boba in NC (I have been to many places here in NC for boba and all of them were gross. NONE of them compare to Tea Fusion Cafe). The place is aesthetically pleasing, they have a WIDE selection of drinks (from regular Milk Tea to Mason Jar Refreshers and they even have options for kids! They even have specialty drinks such as the Mangonada!). If you want to grab a bite to eat, I definitely recommend their Banh Mi's! The staff are also SUPER friendly and the place is pretty clean! I will definitely be coming again soon!
Nice hangout spot with great fresh tea! I didn't try the snacks but I really wanted to! Would go there for a light lunch and definitely another late night tea run!

Ordered the watermelon boba and it was disgusting- mix between bubblegum and pepto. Manager said they could only remake it not give me a different flavor. Absolutely absurd- not sure how they stay in business with that kind of customer service! $7 and 20 minutes of my time wasted.

Milk Tea had a very good flavor, boba was not very soft/ easy to chew.
I ordered online and was not greeted upon entering the establishment. The person at the counter just said "What is it?" To which I responded with my name. She hen proceeded to place my items on the bakery display instead of handing to me at the counter I was standing at, which I thought was rude. No thank you, come again, nothing.

I am very big on customer service and it seems this place, or that individual is lacking in that area.
Nice tea place in the University area. Nice ambiance, good snacks and bubble tea. I would have given a better review but some of the menu was unavailable.
Best boba ever! Their coffee one is

So clean, so comfy and chic. Nicely decorated and it could be my go to boba place! Great prices! I asked ChatGPT which is the cheapest boba place and it took me here. Im so glad it did. I got their Thai Tea, something I've never got before. And it's was scrumptious! The workers are fast and very patient and kind! They will make your day.
Great coffee milk tea
I love their popcorn chicken

I'm sorry Tea fushion was my favorite place to buy drinks but today when I went I bought 3  strawberry kiss and when I tried the drink the strawberries were rotten, and I asked the other 2 people and they said the same thing it tasted rotten that's disgusting
Ordered the popcorn chicken and it was definitely not chicken. I'm not sure what it is but it was absolutely disgusting. And their latte is not an espresso.

Plenty of seating, lovely atmosphere. Staff was courteous but not super bubbly. Prices are decent, I can understand due to the location. Drink was made quick enough. Kind of would have liked to have been offered a different milk option because I prefer non dairy options but I'll keep that in mind next time I go. Latte tasted good, good portion size, and plenty of ice. Plenty of options for non boba customers such as slushees, lattes, and other niche drink options. Also a good selection of snack but would have appreciated pictures of said options. Ample parking in the shopping center. Room for improvement on customer service but overall not a bad experience.
Mango Mason Jar and Popcorn Chicken really good! I am not  a huge fan of the boba. $7.79 for a large drink, ridiculous, and very stingy with the boba. It barely fills the bottom of the cup.

I ordered delivery for lunch. I would said one of the best Banh Mi sandwiches I ever had in this area. It's perfect balance of bread, meat, and veggies. The best part was the veggies. I have had many Banh Mi before where they definitely cheap on the veggies, not this place. There were a heap of the pickled carrots and white radish on top of the sandwiches just how I liked it!!! The tea whole not traditional Taiwanese style but it was well balanced and not too sweet!!! Overall it is an amazing place would definitely go back for more!!!
Best boba in town!!!!
Best boba around!

I love this place very much. The food here is great, the atmosphere is very welcoming and the customer service is good as well. In my opinion, the Mason Jar refreshers taste amazing and are the most bang for your buck. I'm always coming here, and I won't be stopping anytime soon!
Usually go to this location and the drinks are always good but I stopped by and it seemed like the popcorn chicken was rushed and lazy , not made properly never have seen it look like this before.
Love the aesthetic and atmosphere here. I also love their tea refreshers.
Best boba tea in Charlotte, and the food is also pretty dang good
Nice place great food I think that they can have a better look for costumers
Loved the building. Very nice inside. My tea refresher was delicious. Would go back!

This place used to be my favorite it used to have good sanitation rate and very clean environment!
now you see spots of juice everywhere!!!
I give it a 1 star because their sanitation rate is bad and the inside is dirty it looks like they don't clean

Wo He Wo Peng You Jin Tian Lai . Mai Liao Ji Fen Nai Cha Deng Liao Chao Guo San Shi Fen Zhong . Li Mian De Yuan Gong Yi Dian Xiao Lu Du Mei You . Wen Liao Hao Ji Ci Du Shi Deng Wu Fen Zhong Deng Wu Fen Zhong
Dian Liao Can Ban Ge Xiao Shi Liao Huan Mei Hao . Hou Mian Lai De Ren Du Yi Jing Zuo Hao Liao . Chai Ping ,Gong Zuo Ren Yuan Ye Bu Zhi Dao Zai Gan Shi Yao .
Well I like this place alot. Last Monday I visit and find out they have some new stuffs and I want to try out. Turned out these stuffs had expired wayyyyyy long ago. Kinda sad. Check your pastries.

What an unexpected gem my daughter found! She knows I love Boba teas, and Tea Fusion is a delightful tea Cafe with a Thai inspired food menu. But they aren't limited to Thai because I also spotted a fruit custard salad cup, macrons, and more delicious yummies. I had the Coconut Bubble tea, and we split the perfectly cooked potstickers. I will be back!

Best boba in all Charlotte. I go there with my daughter all the time. Favorite boba is the Taro Horchata and Oreo Cookie (blended with boba). Also, the bulgogi steak sandwich is amazing. Thank me later.

I enjoy coming here with my sisters  Especially in the mornings when it's a little less busy.
We usually get Oreo Cookie and Strawberry Kiss. They're delicious! Also the music here is really nice
The Boba here is always perfect! Haven't had a drink here yet that I didn't like.
It is dark and they still have some parts close off

First time coming here. The atmosphere is very relaxing.  Music in the background is very soothing. I had the Fusion special Banh mi and passionfruit pleasure mason tea. It was great, a light lunch. I'm definitely coming back to try everything else on the menu.
23 minutes waiting for 2 drinks?, so ridiculous!
Ordered a strawberry milk tea- should've specified if it had a black tea base... pretty sure it's just milk and strawberry powder. No real fruit. If that's what you're after, this is the place.

Used to go there very often in 2023, sadly the store took a downturn in 2024

1. I typically order the same drink, which used to cost around $7.25 but now costs $9 due to a price increase on add-ons to $0.75. I can't justify paying $9 for a boba drink. Even a good Starbucks isn't that much.

2. Orders used to be accurate but now it's hit or miss depending on the day you order. I always order less sweet but the last 2 times the drink was so sweet I just couldn't drink it, so $18 down the drain. I may have been unlucky so will try in a few months and see.

Don't get me wrong, it's worth trying but the value and service proposition drove me away.

Sadly my favorite place in Charlotte took a disappointing turn. I feel like the culture of Tea Fusion no longer exist, I'm glad they "evolved" and are doing well but sad to see what it use to be disappear. Unfortunately the food matches the review - room temperature, stale bread, dry meet and it still took 10-15 mins to get out.

All that to be said, I do wish you guys luck.
My daughter took me out for brunch & I had my first bubble tea. Get it blended. It's delicious, as were the dumplings  & pork sandwich
Boba tea! Sometimes it's more fresh than others.
Really enjoyed my vanilla chai bubble tea!  So good!
My daughter and I love this place. I highly recommend.
Thai tea was really good, on my banh mi my veggies had that refrigerator taste

From Day 1, it has been 5  stars. Service is usually great, but I will admit sometimes certain cashiers get your order wrong and I seem to always crave them on the day they're closed. But they immediately remake your order. Definitely the best Boba Tea in town.
Why are the tables dirty and dusty?

Great atmosphere! I ordered the bubble tea in smoothie form. I'm glad they asked me what kind of milk I wanted. They offer almond milk if you didn't know. Great place to hangout, next time I'll try their food
2nd visit 1/28/24. I ordered the same drink, this time around I added the bulgogi sandwich and it was delicious
Efficient and professional. Best Tiger Milk Tea I've ever had.
I hope the kitchen is cleaner than the bathroom.
I bought house milk tea with boba. It was sweet and delicious, but a little too sweet for me.

They close at 9 but don't count on getting food until 9. They close the kitchen down earlier. Ordered on the app tonight but got nothing. "Kitchen closed" even though it was before 9, the doors were open, and the open sign was on. I got a refund, so they got two stars instead of one. Why would you keep your restaurant open when no orders can be placed? I've never seen this done before.
I had the bubble tea. I love that they give you an option of what kind of milk to use. I had it with almond milk and it was in a smoothie form. The mango bubble tea. Great atmosphere and vibe
Good stuff.
A favorite place. Can be slow at times, but it is worth the wait. Great atmosphere to meet up with friends or work/study.

I got a coffee boba tea with caramel drizzle and tapioca pearls. It was amazing!! The coffee was a different taste, it reminded me of Vietnamese coffee which I love. For people who don't tend to like their coffee sweet may need to ask for it with less sweetener or don't add the caramel. But for me it was perfect! They were pretty busy when I went on a Sunday afternoon, so the service wasn't fast but I understand that's because they had many customers.
I have good taste and energy feeling drink

Very disappointed today, got all the way home and my sandwich tasted sour and weird. I called multiple times and no one answered. Just sucks because i come here all the time. Staff were lovely as usual though.

Tea Fusion Cafe is my go-to place for a delightful beverage experience. Their coffee with boba slushy has become my absolute favorite!

Every time I visit, I'm greeted with a burst of flavor and refreshment that's hard to find elsewhere. The combination of rich coffee and chewy boba pearls in a slushy form is simply divine. It's the perfect balance of sweetness and caffeine kick.

Not only is the drink fantastic, but the ambiance at Tea Fusion Cafe is also cozy and inviting. The staff is friendly and accommodating, making each visit a pleasant one.

I highly recommend Tea Fusion Cafe to anyone looking for a unique and delicious beverage experience. It's the perfect spot to satisfy your cravings for a coffee and boba fix!
They aren't very consistent with their bubble tea. It tastes different depending on who makes it I guess. Their fried tofu snack is delicious.
This is my niece's favorite place to go for boba tea! The staff is always nice and friendly!
Love this place! I drive 40 minutes just to get their teas, it's very popular and crowded must of the time but so worthy.
This boba tea is great! The inside of the store is nice to study, work, or spend time with friends. However, expect to wait 10-15 minutes for drinks when they are busy.
great customer service, great food and drink, highly recommended
The costumer service was great, and drinks are AMAZING especially the refreshers
Great customer service! Love this place
Great service, fresh drinks and food! Highly recommend
Best boba place in Charlotte! The passion fruit pleasure is a must!
The best in town !  thank you guys for the amazing service
My favorite all time !!!
The best bubble tea in town
Best boba everour go to place, never had a bad experience

Order a mix of mango and strawberries blended with bobba and the boba itsself tasted literally like tobacco, the juice was good tho, i asked if i can just like swap the boba with something else or just take it off, got a bad look from the employee and she told me no you can not and looked away!
Very disappointing and inconvenient!!!

The beverage selection at this establishment is satisfactory. However, we found the drinks to be less sweet than our personal preference. It is worth noting that shaved ice was not available during our visit, which was somewhat disappointing given the season. The Bahn Mi appears to be a popular menu item, and we intend to sample it on our next visit.
Terrible customer service and food
Thai tea was awesome!
Love this place.  Food and Tea is great.  Love the atmosphere and the couches/lounge area they have set up

First visit here & I specifically wanted the Bubba tea. Since I've had my first one ever, I've become addicted! Nice, small shop with some comfortable seating in the front & tables in the back.
Surprised to see they offer food or small snacks too. I requested the popcorn shrimp but they were out so I ordered the popcorn chicken I instead. The breading was different & probably would have tasted better but it was overcooked.
The vanilla bean Bubba tea with pearls (also called tapioca depending on where you order from) however it's all the same was good.
The staff was friendly and answered any questions I had about the menu. I will go back to try some more items before giving my final opinion.
It was actually very, very good...
Nice options for drinks...love the ambience of the place.

9:49pm on a Saturday and supposedly they are closed but the sign on the door say they close at 10pm. I drove 10 minutes just to basically get the door slammed in my face. Bad business and I will be going to share tea from now on.

I had posted a while back. This place was great but now I want to make sure to give a proper review the lady working at the front register. I had no idea how to explain the sandwiches and they started playing music. That was absolutely disgusting with very foul language in it and I can tell the owner is not there because that there's no way the owner would allow that music to be playing. I have my kids with me. This is definitely not the place to bring children.
Best Boba tea in NC. Lines are typically out the door but definitely worth the wait.

Good service, sandwiches were delicious, toasted or untoasted and the eggrolls were served hot with a sweet chili sauce  and the mango tea with lychee was also good! Not too sweet but with good mango taste, I'll definitely recommend and will come back, prices were not bad!

love this place! the food and boba was good, and the interior is really cute. the seals for the large drinks are also adorable! I haven't been while it was super busy yet, but wait times for me didn't exceed more than 10-15 minutes.
Completely unorganized staff at opening. 15 min for a coffee and boba with 4 people working and no line. Much longer for ban mi

The popcorn chicken here is AMAZING. I wish I could figure out the recipe because it's so fantastic.

The bahn mi here is also so so good.

And then the boba. So good, delicious, and good. I love the way they sugar the boba pearls.
Good banh mi and bubble drinks. Place was clean but busy with take out orders. Will visit again.
I got a blended coconut bubble tea, very underwhelming. Tasted like ice.
Honestly a bit disappointed. The place had super high reviews. The boba was really tough to chew. The presentation was good, Thai tea looked nice. Would not come back
Refreshing teas and snacks to go with it. Their chocolate cake is a must try!!

Super nice Cafe but casheirs are kinda stuck up college kids.  The drink is served sealed meaning it's shipped that way so I question how fresh this is. I got the Mason jar refresher passion fruit flavor. It's served in a really nice large plastic cup I'll definitely reuse. The drink is sealed with a large Boba straw. There's almost too much fruit in this. $5.75 for a fairly large drink not bad but not sure it'll be my go to spot because cashiers seemed snobby.

I've mostly come here for boba tea, only thing I've bought BUT today was a big let down more from a sanitary point instead of having their straws individually wrapped like they always have they had their straws some buckets where everyone could just dig their hands in and grab. Not sanitary at all . If they were pens to sign even still at my job we have to split the dirty pens from the cleans ones and sanitize them . Straws  are one thing that shouldn't be left out there for people to just swing their hands on. And when I asked for the individually wrap one she said she didn't have more when a guy before me hand just gotten his order and had the individually wrap straws .

My daughter LOVES this place!!!
Friendly and Super Clean!!!
Good

Our order was estimated to be done at 5:50 but we got it at 6:20. They were somewhat busy but when we got our order, we still received the incorrect order when we pick up. We didn't notice because they had already wrapped it in a bag. We tried calling but the voicemail is full and no one is answering.

I saw this place when I search for bubble teas. I am a big fan of bubble tea, so I came this place, ordered two large mango buble tea.The clerk is very perfunctory, and the mango bubble tea tastes terrible with lots of impurities that are not well mixed.
The fruit tea is delicious. This place is always busy. Banh mi or Vietnamese subsandwich is very good too.

Changing my old 4 star rating to 5 starz!
Covid have given us all a hard time. Than you for bringing back the bami. Waiting for you mason jar to be back!
Great service great boba and food
It was so good. First time tried it and I also got the mega mango with extra mango jellies . It's the garlic bulgogi Bahn mi !
Excellent ambience in a great location. The food is really great and a great bubble tea place. Would recommend and go often!
Delicious milkshakes. We tried the strawberry and lychee ones. The lychee flavor was okay. Strawberry was good as always. Will try other flavors some other time.
I love the boba tea here... Bubble poppers is a must try topping.
So good
Very good, I always enjoy their food specially their drinks
Great choices! We just got boba, no food, but they had very unique options to choose from. The horchata boba is amazing!

Went here for the first time on Christmas eve for a pick up order and after that we just kept on ordering delivery orders because their avocado and mango drinks are just soooo good! Try it, add mango jellies to your avocado drink!!!

My husband and I have been coming here for years! I love their fruit tea and Vietnamese coffee drinks. The banh mi tofu is amazing but just one star off for the inflation of pricing for sandwiches over the past couple of years since they are close to double the price.
Great atmosphere, I feel like the tea was a bit powdery, it would be cool to see something homemade/seasonal/personal touches to it more.

I love coconuts boba tea
I love taro boba tea
I love popcorn chicken and sanwich Bulgogi
Every thing in this stored  taste very good

I love to have some boba tea for some refreshment, and this restaurant was s the prefect spot. Inside it's pretty cool and food tastes soo good. I tired popcorn chicken and it tasted delicious. 100% recommend this place!
Best Boba place I've ever been too <3

This is my favorite place for blended milk teas with boba. If you're like me and need alternative milk like soy or almond then this is your place. Snack food like popcorn chicken will cost you $5+ but besides that this is a great little spot and perfect for college students.
Cool place with hip vibe. Drinks are cool and refreshing too.
It's a nice hangout spot to play some board games and have a quick bite. The service is fast and friendly.
Cashier was very helpful and pleasant. Ordered mango with boba and mango poppers. First time here and will be returning

Get vibe and place to chill and eat. The boba tea is great, but the banh mi was subpar. The price of the banh mi is very high for the amount you receive also. The flavor just don't hit like the others. I expect to be a very tasting for the price, but it was ok.
This place smells like dirty shoes and body odor.
Popcorn chicken was great. The grilled pork bahn mi was good. It was disappointing to find out that they discontinued the shaved snow ice.
Undiscovered gem!
The Best

They were quite busy on a sunday afternoon. We waited at least 10 minutes. The staff was working hard to get all the orders out.  I ordered the lychee. It was way too sweet. I poured out half and added unsweetened green tea when I got home. The boba tasted fresh. I think because it was busy that day, they mightve rushed. I might go back and try something else.
Great
Everything is perfect!

I placed a mobile order 30 minutes ahead of my arrival. I get there and they had cancelled my order without a text or call. They told me they EMAILED it. The reason was they were busy. She offered to make it then, and I ask them how long it would take if they started making it then. They said 30 mins. So you could have just put it in the queue when I ordered it??? Ridiculous. It was only bubble tea!

Love there refresher drinks. I love their thai milk tea as well.  I'm not a big fan of their taro tho.
Update: Bahn mi sandwiches has gone down hill. It's not as good as it used to be. However I love their popcorn chickens!
Waiting 25 min for a drink is ridiculous
Always great

Tofu must be every "expensive" due to inflation, they increased tofu sandwich from 5 to 7.5, 50 percent more.

And the taro bubble tea I had tasted different now, I think they forgot to put sugar inside...not sweet at all...it used to be my favorite thing here... disappointed...
Really good BUT sandwich increased from $4.50/$5-7.50. SHEESH!
Delicious Boba with great and fast service!
Fast service and good Boba.
Bad customer service!!  they put more ices than a flavors....I sipped 3times and the drink was already done.
SO GOOD and pretty quick! my favorite is the lemongrass chicken bahn mi and taro or read bean boba tea. the fried tofu is really good too!

Hi there Google Gang, you have to try this SPOT it's the BOMBDIGADEE!!! Try there Pineapple Paradise, you'll love it I guarantee it... Also, I had there popcorn chicken and it was the best I've ever HAD, it has a Lil "Kick"  but,  was on POINT cooked too perfection. Because of the PANDEMIC, facial coverings are required.. Today, Thursday April 15, 2021 I always enjoy coming to Tea Fusion CAFE, they're the best by far I've ever experienced.. I usually get the #3MJ Mega Mango and the #S1 Popcorn Chicken, they ARE to die for in my book that's how good they are.. Service is always pleasant, and facial coverings are required.. I'm from the Columbia area and travel to and from just for these items.. I highly recommend you stop by and give Tea Fusion CAFE a try, you'll love it..

My wife went here with me and we both ordered and my drink came out perfectly. My wife's drink, she ordered a watermelon slush, it was basically pink ice with almost no flavouring in it at all. She ended up taking my drink and I ended up with the "watermelon" slush that's just basically pure ice. We wanted to get it changed but they have a sign that says they have a no refund policy. It was such a bummer because I loved my drink but they messed up the watermelon slush so bad that my wife took my drink

Been coming for years and will continue but just a fyi for the owner and manager. The staff should not look at people from head to toe when they enter the place. Instead they should greet them. That's the professional manner needed when in customer service.

The best shop in town! Had a Lychee Milk Tea with Passion Fruit Bursting Bobas and a Bulgogi Bahn Mi and I just started coming back into the office and this is going to be the new spot! I love the variety, the customization, and the prices!
The Mega Mango and Blended Coffee Bubble Tea drinks are excellent. Fried Egg and Lemongrass Chicken Bahn Mi Sandwiches are great as well. Highly recommend.

My boyfriend and I really love this place! The atmosphere was incredible and welcoming. The staff is amazing. I loved the kpop songs that were playing and their food and drinks were immaculate. Definitely coming back for a while!
Great boba tea.

I'm very disappointed. Will never be going back.
I've been here multiple times, hate to say it but just feels like it just keeps going down.

It seems they are always out of something.

Took almost an hour to get two bahn mi sandwich and two drinks. In the many times I've been here, I have never waited this long before. They had full staff in the back running around prepping orders. Everyone who came in after were  getting their drinks and food before us. They could've at least given us our drink and let us know they are still prepping the sandwiches and it's going to take longer. Instead we had to wait almost an hour. Finally went to ask at the counter (I understand they were busy, but everyone it the back just kind of ignores you and don't even acknowledge or try to see if you need help when standing in front of the pickup counter) and was told they were still prepping the sandwiches. Finally got our order after a few minutes after we asked. If we didn't ask we probably won't ever get it.

Very disappointed.
Honestly the best Boba. Grass jelly and some of the other jellies are good too! Often the employees are students or young people so that's the vibe in that place.
Sandwiches are always delicious

This place was pretty cool. The interior was relaxing- perfect for meeting with friends and working on homework for the student on the go. The tea was really good too! Swrvice was fantastic and the music playing was fitting.
I had the vanilla Chai smoothie, incredibly delicious!

We had ordered vanilla chai, thai tea and oreo crush bubble teas with boba.
Taste was great, heard that Mango was great but they are out of stock when we visited.
Lines will be big here, so expect that you will stand sometime in Q.
Fast! Fresh drink!
Wow. Absolutely delicious. Can't wait for my next coffee fusion.
Pretty cool Cafe. Lots of free parking, clean, pleasant staff, food is well prepared. Tastes fresh and not oily as lots of places are.

As a family we have a big story behind bubble tea. ...but I will spare You the details. Both strawberry and mango bubble tea were good. They cost at or more than a fancy coffee drink. Feb 2022 $6 a drink. They do taste good though.
I love the environment that I felt there, Nice people with nice scent and also they're so friendly with me and my friend.
Absolutaly great drinks and wraps but not a fan of calimari or popcorn shrimp, feal like they microwave it.

i get boba from here literally all the time, like almost every single day since the last 5 years; literally accidentally ordered the wrong drink once and they refused to change it and were not accommodating at all. & it wasn't even super busy or anything.
Bad service
Served raw popcorn chicken twice had to request a refund.... everything else was ok as far as tea and boba....
Great boba. Never undercooked. Chewy. Their thai tea is very good.
Best place near University City to get a bubble tea, just wish the price was a little lower but you get what you pay for.
The shop was super busy every time I visited. But the coconut bubble tea was amazing. I dream about it often.
This time the passion  boba tea and the strawberry boba tea  was missing flavor. The order took more than 20 minutes.
Excellent Bahn Mi and a bunch of tea options as well as bubble Boba drinks. I scratch the pate' and add avocado.
Nice place
I love the blended vanilla and honeydew bubble tea here..
chill spot with a couple of options for non meat eaters. wish there were more vegan options tho.

Good bubble tea!! But the food is not worth it!! I got popcorn chicken and they looked disgusting!! Tried one and didn't feel like it was chicken!! Overall not a great experience!! Wouldn't recommend it !!
Best boba tea around, greatest customer service love these people get the vanilla chai milk boba tea or the taro milk boba tea DELICIOUS
The boba is amazing and it's not a long wait, the shop is nice and had a great atmosphere

Whooaa! I just had the first sweet tea with fresh fruit of my life. Wow. I didn't know what I was missing. I am now a loyal customer and I can't wait to try another flavor.

Tea Fusion Cafe has a very hip vibe and is in a good location close to Charlotte University (UNCC). Next time in I'm going to grab lunch too.  Give them a try!
Love the bahn Mi options. I hope the shaved ice will come back soon :( the melon shaved Icecream was so good.
My kids love this place. Great quality with a wide selection.

So good. Tons of customization options. I love the thai tea with boba and the tropical fruit teas (they are flavored green teas) with rainbow jellies. My husband hates boba but likes the jellies. Look over the menu before ordering or it can be a little overwhelming.
**Edit: husband now loves boba and likes the coffee milk tea with boba.
It was a long wait.
First time having Bubble tea. It was good, but you have to get used to it.
We got a green tea and a milk tea with bobas. The green tea was so bad that we just tossed it. The milk tea was okay enough to drink. Pretty disappointing drinks.

Great place! I ordered using the app for pickup and got the blended red bean boba tea and takoyaki. The takoyaki was fresh and so good! I also appreciated that the tea wasn't overly sweet and a generous amount for the price. Definitely recommend.

I love this place! Service is always friendly, the boba tea is delicious (my favorites being coconut & taro) and the pot stickers which I tried today where SCRUMPTIOUS. Perfect late night snack. The bahn mis are toasty and fresh. One of my favorite spots!
El sabor excelente pero muy larga la espera creo que demaciada
Love their bubbles teas.... very busy cafe, try them and you'll be hooked.
Clean and fresh atmosphere, friendly staff, delicious boba tea

Tea Fusion is THE spot if you ever decide to grab a delicious Boba tea or just a place to meet up with friends and family. Great atmosphere and high quality foods and drinks.
I have been coming to this place ever since it opened and it seem to never disappoint me.
Mr. Jimmy is a wholesome and very educated person that treats everyone first class and as family. Highly recommend this place!

Great place to grab some bubble tea- probably some of the freshest around the University area. Sometimes service leaves a bit to be desired, but I can't fault them for the success of being so busy- the staff does well with the space they have. The cafe is clean, the food is good, and the prices are solid. If you're seeking solitude or a quiet place to work, though, this might be a little too busy for your needs.
Very refreshing sandwich on a hot day, tea's and drinks are fresh, invigorating, and high quality!
Okay okay
Such a cute cafe. Adore the rocks and elegant designs. Delicious drinks!

I used to love this place i used to go two times a week. Not anymore now they are not nice poor customer service except for the tall white guy his super sweet. All the girls are not welcoming also i didn't like how my drink tasted and no apology was given like hello im spending my money on a drink that doesn't taste well,also if you ask for a refund they refuse as they say they don't allow refund.
My favorite bubble tea spot here in charlotte. My families favorites are green tea, watermelon and strawberry.

I come here 3 times a week only for the mango bubble tea and the last three times it was completely different it tasted like it had yogurt in it and I didn't order a yogurt Mango bubble tea I don't understand why it looks and taste different. Im really upset because I truly used to enjoy the drink
Delicious Bahn mi  good service, everyone was very seeet, and professional. Great environment. Will definitely be back, I can see myself working on my laptop here while enjoying good drinks and food.
Delicious and fun!
Great banh mi with mega mango drink. Tasty!
Went there for ice shaved, but they no longer selling it. Tried other drinks, not impressed at all. Cozy place to hangout. Too much employees, idk what for, maybe training?
Love the service and the bubble tea they have different flavors to pick i personally always pick green tea bubble tea because its really good.
Got a milk and a fresh tea, both were good. The bobas were great, they milk tea was a little warm, though. We also got popcorn chicken, but the portion was a little small.
Owner is very kind and the workers seem to be as well. Never had an issue here!

I'm honestly confused as to why there's so much hype about this place. I've actually been here several times to get a good idea of it instead of giving a review based on one visit-and the boba always seem to fail me AND my friends. I'm writing this on the behalf of myself and my friends. I'm glad I wasn't the only one who felt off about the boba. The tea refreshers are fine, it's the milk tea and tapioca that are just not worth it. We went yesterday and the drinks were just not good, the tapioca was straight up soggy. That last visit really confirmed it's unworthiness for all of us. Just disappointed because we went there several times to give it a chance. The reason they are hyped up is because of the aesthetic environment and the tea refreshers, which is good for them but please rethink how you cook your boba and make your flavors!

I have been going there for months and actually enjoyed their drinks thoroughly. I always order my bubble teas with less sweet and then no sweet in the special instructions, What I received to day was fully sweet, I tried to call 5 x to get them to make a new one but no 1 would answer,  I then went back to the store and asked for a refund since I did not have time now to have a new drink made,l and I only received $6 of my $7.55 purchase.  I don't expect an order to be right every single time I go to a location but I do expect there to be somebody to answer a phone while operating a business, for complaints or issues with their service.

This review is going to sound too good to be true but I promise it's not. This Cafe has the best boba in Charlotte and on top of that they have magnificent food. Everything I've gotten there has been amazing and the staff is so friendly. Last time I was in there the staff accidentally forgot to give me a straw and when I went back in the owner gave me a piece of cake (which was amazing btw) and my straws. I'm 15 so it's very hard to please me and this place continues to amaze me. If I could give it 6 stars I would.
Very nice staff drinks are really good
Super fresh & flavorful ! Great price point !
Loved it!!!
Great
I take my wife here just about every other day or so just to keep up with her boba addiction! Nice staff and you can see how efficient they work together!
Great place to grab Banh Mi and boba tea.
A great experience!
The tea I tried did have a lot of flavor. They were out of a lot of items

The drinks were good but the service wasn't the best. The last time I visited was a week ago, there was a guy working at the register that was so friendly and welcoming, he completely gave this place a different vibe than what I've experienced the others times I've been here. If he was the one working at the front the other times I would've given 5 stars!

Ordered through GrubHub. The food took over an hour but at least it was still hot. HORRIBLE customer service though. I have food allergies and often have to ask restaurants about how the food is prepared. Tried calling them over 12 times, no one picked up. In fact, the phone would ring for about 3 seconds and then hang up. I've never had a restaurant do that-intentionally hang up the phone! We ordered bubble tea and it was ok but I don't know how the food was because I couldn't eat mine without risking an allergy attack.
There has never been a time that I have driven up to Charlotte and not stop by here. I even went twice in a day. Tea Fusion is my crack, that is all.

Yea Fusion has the most refreshing drinks in all of CLT. For the same price as Starbucks you can get a way better refresher with the satisfaction of poking a hole in the plastic cover with the straw. It's so satisfying
The blended Oreo cookie bubble tea is a must try here. The strawberry variation is a bit sweet though.
They have the best boba tea but it is always packed on the weekends
Crowded and slow but the food and drinks are the best in university.
I had a good time with my husband and grandaugthers it was delicious
Love the drinks
Que comida tan rica y con poca grasa!! Probe ayer y hasta ahora tengo ganas de volver a este lugar a probar cosas nuevas. Que combinaciones tan ricas
Great drinks but line wasn't organized at all but ll most definitely go back, it was my first time and I did enjoy my drink
First time to this restaurant. And we loved it. Great food and service.
The best boba in town
If you like fruit tea, the Mega Manga mason jar tea is to die for! This place is usually pretty busy, but they crank things out pretty fast.
This place has the best boba tea I have ever tasted in my lifetime!
Good food and drinks. The wait time can be long and the inside of the restaurant can get a bit crowded.
Ordered strawberry Boba Tea with mango bubbles Really good flavor and sweet Really worth the price to enjoy one of this

Thai iced tea was on point. I would still recommend Gong Cha for the bubble tea, but overall good (was a little warm when I got it, but the boba was super soft. We got the Takoyaki as well (has octopus in it so it may not be for everyone )
Good for the diet
Thai tea was okay, could have been they were really busy but I've had better around town

Great customer service!!! It is so often that you go somewhere 15 minutes before close and the staff are extremely rude and annoyed. That was not the case here tonight. The place was packed yet the employees were extremely friendly and efficient. Not to mention my drink was absolutely amazing!! I really do love this place.
The fried tofu & the Tofu lemongrass banh mi was so delicious!!!! Very flavorful!!! Our teas were yummy too! I really like their Mason jar drinks!!!!
I have never heard of bubble tea before my daughter brought it up to me and we went to this place and it is absolutely amazing we will be regular :-)
Probably the best boba you can get in Charlotte! If you are new to this and don't know what to get, I highly recommend Taro bubble tea! You won't be disappointed!
Chilling place lol
This place is awesome. Chill spot for sure and great food and I had the Avocado Boba Tea and it was great. I will be back.
Everyone needs to try the bubble tea. The place is cool to hang out in and food is alright but the fruity bubble tea is amazing
This place is always busy, however that doesn't stop me from coming here
I loved the tea here. I had egg pudding in my tea for the first time, which was delicious. I would recommend.
Friendly staff! However the boba was decent and their popcorn chicken was alright.
Espectacular buena atencion muy buen te y limpio

The best place for bubble tea imo. The boba is often still warm (freshly made!) when I get my drink and always the perfect chewy texture - not too soft and not too firm. The taro is my favorite, it has good flavor and not chalky or overly sweet like other places.

The bulgolgi banh mi is the best thing on the menu. It's a bit pricey but so worth it.
I loved the mango bubble tea. Place is cleaned and very fast with order
Not the best boba place I've been to.
1 out of 4 items I ordered were correct. Not worth the hype, don't go. Go somewhere else.
Surprisingly great food/snack! Pricing is reasonable and service is fast and with a smile.
Never had bubble tea before but i will have it now for sure.

I've been a here a few times, their bubble tea is some of the best I've had in Charlotte. The strawberry is my favorite.

Most recently I got the pina colada bubble tea and popcorn chicken which came in a cute bento box that they kept open so the heat could escape without making the chicken soggy. That added detail made me happy. The chicken was super crisp and seasoned well but had a weird after taste from the marinade they used. The pina colada bubble tea was just ok. Pretty but not much flavor.
Good
We drive from Maiden to Charlotte to go here. Great snacks..fabulous Bubble teas and friendly people.
Great drinks on the menu. I haven't had any food therr
Tea wasn't that great

I happened to come across this place while exploring Charlotte and the surrounding area a while back. It's at the top of my list to visit each time I'm in the area! The mason jar teas are amazing (not to mention super pretty and perfect for insta pics!) I typically order mine for dine in and then end up getting a to go cup for what I can't finish while there. Love that they seal the To go cups. Very reasonably priced.
Good
